sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { render } from 'react-dom' import AppContext from '../context' export default class PetCard extends Component { static contextType = AppContext render() { const { pet, handleAdoptClick } = this.props let isFirst = false return ( <>

{pet.name}

{pet.description}

{pet.story}

Breed: {pet.breed}

Gender: {pet.gender}

Age: {pet.age}

) } }
